description:
The desktop music player from the future!


Main Changes:
- Added initial Tidal support.
- Restored Windows and macOS builds.
- Fixed Spotify local playback. Now uses OAuth instead of requesting password.
- Lots of code cleanup refactors and bug fixes. (Special thanks to @C0rn3j)
:warning: Warning: Once upgraded to v7.9.0, user data cannot be downgraded to an earlier version.
:package: Packagers: Note that there have been major build system changes since the previous release.
:package: Flatpak Note: Chromecast support temporarily unavailable.
Consider donating if you'd like so support development of Tauon! :fireworks: :heart:
- @C0rn3j https://rys.rs/donate
- @Taiko2k
